bibl.title: Transformation of Egyptian Agricultural Receipts in the 10th-12th Centuries C.E.
bibl.note: Edition of P. Berol. Inv. 8179 [Region of Ṭutūn, June 1063]. - Fatimid financial procedures and chancery practice. - Comparison to early receipt formulary. - Fatimid receipts in the context of agricultural manuals. - Categories of tenure. - Three years.

bibl.title: Forschung in der Papyrussammlung. Eine Festgabe für das Neue Museum

bibl.seg: Gladys Frantz-Murphy, Transformation of Egyptian Agricultural Receipts in the 10th-12th Centuries C.E.

Verena M. Lepper (ed.), Forschung in der Papyrussammlung. Eine Festgabe für das Neue Museum = Ägyptische und Orientalische Papyri und Handschriften des Ägyptischen Museums und Papyrussammlung Berlin. 1 (Berlin, 2012) pp. 425-434, 1 pl.

Edition of P. Berol. Inv. 8179 [Region of Ṭutūn, June 1063]. - Fatimid financial procedures and chancery practice. - Comparison to early receipt formulary. - Fatimid receipts in the context of agricultural manuals. - Categories of tenure. - Three years.
